products.title: Amor Brownie Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, deep brown colour of the amor brownie is great for any room in the home. The bold, solid colour is sure to stand out no matter what the decor - and the water resistant and blackout properties makes it suitable for home and office. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. products.title: Deanna Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna latte combines the signature patterning of the deanna with a rich, creamy brown we call latte. The pretty texture adds interest, while the colour is subtle and fairly neutral, and combined they offer a quality finish perfect for your home. Ideal for bringing a touch of much needed warmth to all-white conservatory or utility, this blind will look stunning combined with natural furniture and woods.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: Indulge your guests in comforting colour with the roma (fr) in latte, featuring a rich and delectable shade of brown. This lenient fabric is both crease-proof and flame-retardant, making it an elegant and modern blind with added practical benefits. Feature the latte amidst an assortment of neutral tones including cream, biscuit, and caramel hues to generate a dcor style with sumptuous and sophisticated colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Hazel - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin (blackout) hazel is a fabric that's true to its name and more than happy in any contemporary home. It's that gentle woody brown that really lifts the depth and character of a room to new heights that we love, and we know you're going to fall in love with it too. Take your time when figuring out how to work hazel into your chosen space by thinking about ways you can pair it with deep creams and sandy beiges.

products.title: Bella Blackout Taupe Brown 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This mink mid-brown vertical blind adds a soft splash of colour and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.description: The nile range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different slat widths so will suit any window in your home. This dark wood blind will look great in rooms with a warm colour scheme or as a contrast to lighter coloured walls. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. products.title: Origin (Blackout) Coffee - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is a recognised problem in many households, so feature the popular origin (blackout) in coffee in your bedroom for some well-deserved rest. This simple addition will help to shield the room against the night-time light, whilst fitting in most window spaces perfectly, and adding some brilliance to your dcor. Merge the coffee with a rich and captivating combination of cream, caramel, and cocoa hues, creating a comforting space full of warming tones.

products.title: Amor Coffee Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.
